duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to drive B2B revenue and acquire new business partners.
Lead a team of sales professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve sales targets and revenue goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Build and maintain strong business relationships, networking, and engaging with potential business clients to drive sales opportunities.
Measure and report on the performance of sales activities, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
